entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • VS Blazor Wasm Debugging Crashes #58667
  • System.Text - Undoc 6.0 APIs #58665
    6.0.0
  • System.Runtime.Versioning - Undoc 6.0 APIs #58664
    6.0.0
  • System.CodeDom - Undoc 6.0 APIs #58663
    6.0.0
  • System.Linq - Undoc 6.0 APIs #58662
    6.0.0
  • System.Collections - Undoc 6.0 APIs #58661
    6.0.0
  • System.Configuration - Undoc 6.0 APIs #58660
    6.0.0
  • Long running test: System.IO.Pipelines.Tests - CopyToAsyncPipeWriterCopiesRemainderAfterReadingSome #58659
  • System.Runtime.CompilerServices - Undoc 6.0 APIs #58657
    6.0.0
  • System.Runtime.InteropServices - Undoc 6.0 APIs #58656
    6.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics - Undoc 6.0 APIs #58654
    6.0.0
  • System.Drawing - Undoc 6.0 APIs #58653
    6.0.0
  • Make all SendAsync methods virtual #58647
  • [wasm] System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests Timeout - the server responded with a status of 401 (Unauthorized) #58643
  • Serialization.Formatters.Tests - numerous failures with server GC #58642
  • [libraries][OSX] System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests PolicyContraints_Mismatch Failed to generate asymmetric keypair #58640
  • Add back StructWithPublicDefaultConstructor test #58639
    7.0.0
  • JSON source gen doesn't detect [JsonNumberHandling] when applied to POCO #58638
    6.0.0
  • The JIT generates suboptimal code when comparing the same values many times. #58633
    7.0.0
  • Test failure: SendRecv_0ByteReceive_Success #58631
    Future
  • Test failure: PostAsyncExpect100Continue_NonSuccessResponse_RequestBodyNotSent #58629
    Future
  • Test failure: Expect100Continue_WaitsExpectedPeriodOfTimeBeforeSendingContent #58628
    Future
  • Test failure: PreAuthenticate_FirstRequestNoHeader_SecondRequestVariousStatusCodes_ThirdRequestPreauthenticates #58625
    Future
  • Test failure: PostAsyncNonDuplex_ServerCompletesResponseBodyThenResetsStreamWithNoError_SuccessAndRequestBodyCancelled #58624
    Future
  • Support variance in IDynamicInterfaceCastable #58619
    7.0.0
  • System.Runtime.Tests Outerloop "killed" on Debian.10 and Debian.11 #58616
  • Calling Abort() or Dispose() on a server WebSocket originating from a HttpListener does nothing on Linux #58614
  • Different number decimal separators for the culture fr-CH in different environments #58650
  • System.IO: Allow recursive file system enumeration to continue when directory link's target does not exist #58612
  • Occasionally failed to install Desktop Runtime dotnet_runtime_5.0.7_win_x86.msi #58610
  • Add reciprocal and SinCos methods to IFloatingPoint #58607
  • [DllImport] fails despite the DLL is already loaded #58601
  • Test failure tracing/eventpipe/reverse/reverse/reverse.sh #58599

Closed

  • HTTPS handshake performance #49845
    Future
  • .NET 5: RID changes made in servicing are missing from shared framework deps file, breaking RID-asset selection for framework dependent applications on new RIDs #50739
    5.0.x
  • Some non-shipping packages in runtime have stable versions #58214
    6.0.0
  • JIT: [QualityWeek] Random edge count assert in Microsoft.VisualBasic.Core.Test #58371
    7.0.0
  • Allow tail call optimization for call + nop + ret #58622
    7.0.0
  • Failing to build coreclr for osx-arm64 #57218
    6.0.0
  • emsdk should place stable versioned blobs in a non-stable dir #58213
    6.0.0
  • Xamarin frameworks assume support for types not in .NETCoreApp today #35401
    7.0.0
  • [mono] Crash when calling an interface method on a struct through a generic default interface method #58394
    6.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Performance/CodeQuality/Roslyn/CscBench/CscBench.sh #55162
    7.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Hang when reading response data #57888
    6.0.0
  • Runtime fails to source build - libSystem.IO.Ports.Native.so.dbg not found #58455
    6.0.0
  • Test failure Microsoft.VisualBasic.Tests.ConversionsTests.ToByte_OverflowObject_ThrowsOverflowException(value: \"65536\") #57544
    7.0.0
  • Move of Evidence type regressed on .NETStandard2.0 with package removal of System.Security.AccessControl #54341
    6.0.0
  • Building libs.src causes build errors #52622
    7.0.0
  • System.TestStructs ships with Micrososoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.Specification.Tests but builds from test directory #49069
    7.0.0
  • Libraries tests timing out on (Alpine.312.Arm32.Open)Ubuntu.1804.ArmArch.Open #46484
    7.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.Process.sln fails to build in Visual Studio #51601
    7.0.0
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main runtime, .NET 7, validation-runtime-.NET 7 #runtime-102478-.NET7 #57710
  • Assertion failed '!varTypeIsGC(varDsc) in Checked crossgen over Microsoft.Diagnostics.Runtime.dll #58259
    6.0.0
  • dotnet publish results in "There is no application host available for the specified RuntimeIdentifier" using RID "osx.11.0-arm64" #58603
  • [JitStressWithRandomNumbers] seq_short_1_d fails #57912
    6.0.0
  • JIT [QualityWeek]: Random edge count assert in System.Text.Json.Tests #58368
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/HardwareIntrinsics/General/Vector256_1/Vector256_1_ro/Vector256_1_ro.sh #58230
    6.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Clean up tests under src/tests/reflection #58673
    area-System.Reflection-coreclr
  • [release/5.0] Add support for variance to IDIC #58672
    Servicing-consider, area-Interop-coreclr
  • Add default value of 0 for EventSource.EventData.Reserved #58671
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Add support for variance to IDIC #58670
    area-Interop-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Retarget DOTNETHOME when installing x64 on ARM64 #58669
    * NO MERGE *, area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Remove unused test libraries in baseservices/threading #58668
    area-System.Threading
  • [release/6.0] Replace S.S.Permissions ref with AccessControl in S.S.C.Xml #58666
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.0
  • The signal enum in the native library should match the managed code. #58658
    community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Support JsonConverterFactory with src-gen #58652
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Use arcade power source build infra #58651
  • Add support for variance to IDIC #58646
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • CI test #58645
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix source generation support for tuples with explicitly named elements #58644
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • Don't force using the system libunwind for source-build #58641
    community-contribution
  • Update libraries helix matrix #58637
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [Mono] Disable a failing test #58634
  • Allow instrumentation for methods with explicit tail calls #58632
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Switch weights to doubles to mitigate rounding inaccuracies and use epsilon when sorting locals #58630
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix ConfigurationManager when BaseDirectory starts with \\?" #58627
    area-System.Configuration
  • WIP: Update MonoVM diagnostics-tracing doc with new features and scenarios. #58620
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, area-Tracing-mono
  • [release/6.0] Increase some of the DnsEndPointTest timeouts #58617
    area-System.Net, 6.0.0
  • Make sure EventPipe streaming thread won't write session->streaming_thread after session free. #58615
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [QUIC] Review comments #58608
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW, area-System.Net.Quic
  • Do Contain analysis after inserting node in block range #58605
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable test parallelization in installer tests #58604
    area-HostModel
  • [release/6.0] Undo struct promotion on "RetInd" code path #58602
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • JIT: relax assert in lvaSetDoNotEnregister #58597
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Remove unused test libraries under classloader #58596
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr

Merged

  • Tls resume PoC (server stateless) #57079
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.0
  • Update solution files for correct ordering of elements #58655
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Run minimal set of iOS / tvOS device tests #58444
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Support JsonConverterFactory with src-gen #58398
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Disable fast path serialization for types with properties using custom converters. #58571
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [release/6.0] Fix crossgen2 calli GC hole by unifying MethodDesc/MethodSignature IsMarshallingRequired logic #58609
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • [main] Conditionally pack symbols based on keepNativeSymbols #58577
    area-System.IO
  • [release/6.0] run System.IO.Tests .NET 5 compat tests on every OS #58613
    area-System.IO, 6.0.0
  • Fix crossgen2 calli GC hole by unifying MethodDesc/MethodSignature IsMarshallingRequired logic #58430
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [libraries] Skip test suites crashing on CI for iOS/tvOS/MacCatalyst #57208
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, os-maccatalyst
  • JIT: adjust assert in optUnmarkCSE #58600
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix source-build on the s390x platform #58618
    source-build, area-Build-mono, 6.0.0
  • Fix Android device issues related to filesystem/IO #58586
    area-System.IO, os-android
  • [mini] Don't add unbox tramopline on generic DIM calls #58521
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • run System.IO.Tests .NET 5 compat tests on every OS #58611
    area-System.IO
  • Fix Console.Write on iOS (#56713) #58559
    area-System.Console
  • Remove unnecessary unsafe keyword #58606
    area-System.Console, 7.0.0
  • Fix source-build on the s390x platform #58553
    community-contribution
  • Increase some of the DnsEndPointTest timeouts #58129
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 7.0.0
  • Add support for build.cmd -vs corehost.sln #58520
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Ensure proper memory ordering in allocator::copy_with_no_repair #58564
    area-GC-coreclr
  • fix spelling #58593
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Undo struct promotion on "RetInd" code path #58582
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Implement support for passing a .env file to corerun to easily set environment variables for stress testing. #58222
    area-Host
  • Import `KEEPALIVE(BOX)` as `KEEPALIVE(ADDR(TEMP))` #54412
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • JIT: fix jump threading to keep track of preds instead of reanalyzing #58579
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Pass a null getter\setter with [JsonIgnore] and src gen #58572
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json

Updated

  • Optimize FMA codegen base on the overwritten #58196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • add TLS 1.3 support to WinHttp #58590
    area-System.Net.Http, os-windows, 7.0.0
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Building Wasm.Build.Tests on windows #58578
    area-Build-mono
  • Add perfmap debug directory entry to crossgen2 output as needed #58552
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • DO NOT MERGE: Macos builds on perf measure pool #58514
  • [release/5.0] Notify Reference Tracker runtime of disconnect at the right time #58412
    Servicing-approved, area-Interop-coreclr, 5.0.11
  • Add cast when replacing promoted struct with field in lowering #58589
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • [wasm] Add support for native relinking after Build, and AOT after publish #57556
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Change hosted pool #57785
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [libraries] Restrict ILLink Suppression xml to mobile platforms #58519
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • [DRAFT][wasm] WebSocket improve send buffers #58199
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net
  • Reflection nullability API: improve test coverage, fix bug found #58479
    area-System.Reflection, 6.0.0
  • Support duplicated type names with src gen #58448
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • only cache credentials on success #58594
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [Libraries] Fix TimeZoneInfoTests IsIanaIdTest for iOS/MacCatalyst/tvOS #58562
  • Fix x86 linux tests #57244
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • #58181 Fix NullReferenceException in crossgen2. #58183
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use CustomCommand to run runtime tests for mobile targets on helix #57292
    area-Infrastructure
  • Search native code in all R2R ni.dll in version bubble #57277
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Add System.Net.Http ServerCertificateCustomValidationCallback ILLink Suppression #58508
    area-System.Net.Http, os-android, 6.0.0
  • Add Win11 RIDs #58588
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0] [mini] Don't add unbox tramopline on generic DIM calls #58585
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • add W11 test queue #58570
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] add Http3LoopbackConnection.ShutdownAsync and use in AcceptConnectionAsync #58336
    area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.0
  • Improve error messages expanding single-file #58557
    area-Single-File, 7.0.0
  • LoggerMessage formatter performance improvements #58524
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Address Windows recommendations for Link APIs #58592
    NO REVIEW, area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • handle that content-encoding can lie #58567
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Add threading test for Regex #58595
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Fix zero initialization use of "initReg" #58410
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] [HTTP/3] Stress disable offending op causing server errors #58541
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NativeAOT: "Undefined instruction was hit" in StartupCodeHelpers.InitializeModules #1499
  • System.Text.Json using source generators produces "Method not found" #1498
  • Get rid of TemplateConstructableTypes #1491

Closed

  • AV on shutdown in finalizer thread #1487
  • Regression after 6.0.0-rc.1.21405.2 (all versions, include latest alpha) #1482

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix thread-safety of timeouts in SymbolicRegexMatcher #1490

Merged

  • Speed up StElemRef if there's no covariance #1496
    area-NativeAOT
  • Commenting and code cleanup for SRM's algebras #1492
  • Clean up Regex SRM unicode folder #1497
  • Stop running FileSystem tests #1495
    area-NativeAOT
  • More cleanup of SymbolicRegexMatcher #1493
  • fixed failing DGML test and turned back serialize-deserialize in DEBUG #1494
  • Use sparse checkout for LLVM #1489
    area-NativeAOT
  • Implement Control Flow Guard annotations #1488
    area-NativeAOT

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Revert main loc process when 17.0 pass is done #20650
    6.0.1xx
  • Hide `--download-to-cache` and `--from-cache` parameters for workload install and update #20642
  • When installing or updating workloads, better handle flaky network connectivity #20617
    6.0.1xx
  • Inconcistencies in the CLI when working with SDKs #20616
  • dotnet run on macOS UX -- x64 emulation #20584

Closed

  • System.Exception: Publish has encountered an error #10621
  • Protect strong name key changes in ApiCompat / package validation #20593

PullRequests

Created

  • Disable main loc build while release/6.0.1xx is running #20648
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add manifest description to get on loc train #20647
    Area-Workloads
  • Fix workload hidden options #20646
    Area-Workloads
  • Update onelocbuild.yml #20645
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use 1ES build pools #20644
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Blazor AOT Cache Busting #20630
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Reorder the EmbedProjectAssetsFile condtion to skip probing the file … #20624
    Area-NetSDK
  • [Razor] Fixes packing on multitargeting projects #20609
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [Razor] Ensure the manifest is not generated when there are no assets or discovery patterns #20607
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [Razor] Fix casing issue when matching projects to configurations #20603
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [Blazor] Fix duplicate entries in blazor.boot.json manifest extensions #20602
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [Razor] Unskip tests #20600
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Do not specify a protocol if server does not require secrets #20577
    Area-AspNetCore

Merged

  • [port to release/6.0.1xx] Fix cross-os symbol generation (#20481) #20626
    Area-ReadyToRun
  • Fix cross-os symbol generation #20481
    Area-ReadyToRun
  • Revert "Ensure the server and client are valid when sending / receiving hot reload messages" #20579
    Servicing-consider, Area-AspNetCore, Area-Watch, 6.0.1xx
  • Revert "Ensure the server and client are valid when sending / receiving hot reload messages (#18912)" (#20579) #20594
    Servicing-approved, Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/5.0.4xx' => 'main' #20555
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Only warn about references that are actually needed at runtime #20567
    Area-Compatibility
  • [WIP] Support installing workloads in user folder #18823
    Area-Workloads
  • Fix `dotnet list package` when current directory contains a `#` character in Unix systems #20449
    Area-NuGet

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-03
entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

  • Remove new handling of nullable value types in method type argument inference #5138

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Some msbuild properties get corrupted before being passed to Roslyn analyzers #56180
    17.0
  • Workspace disposal during MEF shutdown may try to create more stuff and throw exceptions #56177
  • "Pull Members Up" does not correctly qualify additional generic type parameters from derived class #56174
  • Editor Tests targeting static abstract members should use at least Net 6 reference assemblies #56171
  • Adding a new method to .NET MAUI Android using Hot Reload does not produce Rude Edit dialog #56170
  • .NET 6 RC 1: changes to overload resolution? Breaks NUnit? #56167
    17.0
  • CodeGenerators? Code Fix for RS1024 is horribly wrong when multiline strings are present #56165
  • Unable to use RoslynCodeTaskFactory in MAC #56164
  • Retarget Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Debugging.Package, PooledObjects.Package, and FunctionResolver to .NET Framework 4.6.1. #56161

Closed

  • String interpolation errors when concatenating multiple string #55993
  • Method ref return a ref return, when having ref parameters #56175
  • Unexpected using clause behaviour in some cases #56172
  • Migrate the Code Analysis page to the new Project Properties UI #53567
    17.1

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix crashes in some nullable error scenarios #56190
    Area-Compilers
  • Don't try to rename references in source generated files #56189
    Area-IDE
  • Fix doubleclick for Value Tracking #56188
    Area-IDE, Feature - IDE Value Tracking
  • Add External Access options for TypeScript #56187
    Area-IDE
  • Use 1ES build pools #56186
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Provide real implementation for RuntimeSupportsStaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces property. #56173
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Render exception documentation texts. #56162
    Area-IDE
  • Bugs/22745 Naming style does not match for camel case and pascal case with underscores #56157
    Area-IDE
  • Use SpillSequences when appropriate instead of Sequences #56153
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #56182
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to main #56178
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Don't reference VS Shell binaries in EditorFeatures.Wpf #56045
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Options refactoring #55686
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56181
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56147
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #56179
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Remove unused ServiceComponentOnOffOptions.DiagnosticProvider #56154
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56168
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #56176
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1339847 #56155
    auto-merge
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1341341 #56169
    auto-merge
  • Wire up the feature flag properly for opening source generated files #56156
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Source generators/timing #55892
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #56150
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56163
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to main #56146
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1339667 #56152
    auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #56158
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56160
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56159
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56149
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Inline Hints: Option to suppress hints where the parameter name and argument name are the same #55781
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56151
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1339482 #56144
    auto-merge
  • Remove legacy progression search #56140
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #56148
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56194
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Remove declaration-only-compilation from CompilationTracker #56139
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56193
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #56192
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56191
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • More options refactoring #56089
    Area-IDE
  • Add ISymbol.MetadataToken #55913
    Area-Compilers
  • Incremental Generator Work Tracking API Implementation #55469
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Preserve conversions on null literals before nullable type argument reinference #56022
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types
  • Add readme.md listing breaking changes doc chronologically #56019
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • List patterns: subsumption checking #53891
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.0
  • Move Static Members: Existing type #56131
    Area-IDE
  • Native Int: constant folding is executed at runtime rather than compile-time if the result depends on the size of native integers #56145
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Native Int
  • Completion: Suggest "await" after dot of awaitable expression #55817
    Area-IDE
  • Improve the tooltip of Inheritance Margin #56026
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • InstallVisualStudio.ps1 pulls wrong Windows SDK version #36165
  • Meta Issue - Data Protection keyring sync/creation race investigation #36157
    .NET 7 Planning
  • HttpLoggingMiddleware is overly aggressive at redacting headers #36156
    6.0-rc2
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes_dapper, mvc #36150
  • Razor Diagnostic Enhancements #36144
  • IntelliSense bug for Razor Components #36143
  • ApiExplorer is useless #36140
  • Blazor webassembly AuthorizeView component is very slow on page loading #36139
  • [BLAZOR WASM] Lagging textarea binding with large amount of text #36138
  • Pipe should complete with exception if WebSockets closed prematurely #36137
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Single file build time regression: proxy-yarp #36136
  • Blazor - RuntimeError: memory access out of bounds #36135

Closed

  • Add support for stating accepts/consumes metadata is required or not #35849
    6.0-rc2
  • ProtectKeysWithCertificate cannot find self-signed certificates #12068
    Next sprint planning
  • Investigate Selenium Upgrade #36048
  • The remote certificate is invalid according to the validation procedure #36052
  • Not able to receive values from Route and Body in a POST call #36063
  • Startup improvement: json #36015
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes_ef #36082

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Migrations Bundles: Provide more info about the bundle #25872
  • The query processor ran out of internal resources #25871
  • Improve exception message when configuring an owned entity type as non-owned #25863

Closed

  • GraphUpdatesSqlServerTest does not use retrying execution strategy #21463
    6.0.0
  • ExecutionStrategy.ShouldRetryOn receives a null argument with concurrency exceptions #23019
    6.0.0
  • Reuse ExecutionStrategy instance #21350
    6.0.0
  • SQLite: ValueGeneratedOnAdd doesn't work on GUID column that is not a key #25847
  • Cast error when using InMemoryDb (tests) and GetColumnType() #25844
  • Typo in RelationalPropertyExtensions.IsFixedLength Doc #25860
    6.0.0
  • EFCore 5.0.7 HasQueryFilter not translating to the same query as EF Core 3.1.8 #25865
  • Remove(entity) vs State=EntityState.Deleted behavior #22465
    6.0.0
  • Entity with ToQuery throws InvalidOperationException in null check after Select #25784
  • How to use two SQL Server database tables (localhost) at the same time? #25752
  • Owned entity marked as "Deleted" do not show up in their Owners "References" collection #25750
  • MigrationsAssembly path not working #25725
  • remove redundant null semantics terms involving non-null parameters #25838
  • Handle old migrations with 32-bit identity seed values #25589
    6.0.0
  • Migrating from .NET 3.2 to .NET 5.0 - Using DefaultIfEmpty() in Query Returns System.ArgumentNullException: 'Value cannot be null. (Parameter 'other')' #23658
    6.0.0
  • System.InvalidCastException when using Scaffold-DbContext for MSSQL #23359
    6.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Readd test for obsolete ToQuery #25870
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #25864
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Merged

  • Reuse some IExecutionStrategy instances. #25836
  • Fix doc typo #25861
  • Reset unknown original value when current value is set #25837
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #25848
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Convert Int32 identity seed value #25857
  • Query: Add regression test for #23658 #25853
  • SqlServer: Ignore Fks whose principal table data is not found #25852

Updated

  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw to 2.0.6-pre20210902144138 #25730
  • Query: Add regression test for #23784 #25855
  • More links to conceptual docs #25814
